title: Complex Number Set Function
description: This function is designed to create a complex number by setting its real and imaginary parts. The user will provide the real part (RE) and the imaginary part (IM) as input parameters, and these values will be assigned to the respective fields of the complex number structure.
name: CSET

input.name: RE
input.description: The real part of the complex number.

input.name: IM
input.description: The imaginary part of the complex number.

return_value.description: The complex number consisting of the provided real and imaginary parts.

fields.name: re
fields.description: The real part of the complex number.

fields.name: im
fields.description: The imaginary part of the complex number.
